snippet.title: Man felled in sickening coward punch attack outside bar
snippet.content:
Sickening video of a one-punch attack on the Gold Coast has been released by police in hope of catching the offender. CCTV shared by Queensland Police showed a man in a black t-shirt outside a bar on Burleigh Road, Broadbeach, about 12.45am on February 11. Police said the man had just been asked to leave the venue, when he was shown lunging at another man and punching him in the head. The 26-year-old victim was thrown backwards and collapsed on the pavement, as the offender fled the scene. The victim suffered multiple fractures as a result of the assault, police said. Investigations are ongoing. Anyone with information is urged to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
